<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

### ModulePath {#a38e1f939a81210d6bf89bac97df2a32f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="StringRef llvm::GlobalValueSummary::ModulePath">
Path of module IR containing value&#39;s definition, used to locate module during importing.

This is only used during parsing of the combined index, or when parsing the per-module index for creation of the combined summary index, not during writing of the per-module index which doesn&#39;t contain a module path string table.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h/#l00556">556</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h">ModuleSummaryIndex.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### OriginalName {#a1cd8f737e583a9faa1a84c3e560431b2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="GlobalValue::GUID llvm::GlobalValueSummary::OriginalName = 0">
This is the hash of the name of the symbol in the original file.

It is identical to the GUID for global symbols, but differs for local since the GUID includes the module level id in the hash.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h/#l00547">547</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h">ModuleSummaryIndex.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### RefEdgeList {#a2b9bbefc9b877ed8bb96e62dcb16ec0b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;ValueInfo, 0&gt; llvm::GlobalValueSummary::RefEdgeList</>}>
List of values referenced by this global value&#39;s definition (either by the initializer of a global variable, or referenced from within a function).

This does not include functions called, which are listed in the derived <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionsummary">FunctionSummary</a> object. We use <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;ValueInfo, 0&gt;</a> instead of std::vector&lt;ValueInfo&gt; for its smaller memory footprint.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h/#l00564">564</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h">ModuleSummaryIndex.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
